segment.source: The following checklist is intended to provide a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take before you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) servers.
segment.target: The following checklist is intended to provide a high-level list of items to consider and outlines the steps you should take before you install the Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) servers.

segment.source: Ensure your computing environment meets the supported configurations required for App-V.
segment.target: Ensure your computing environment meets the supported configurations required for App-V.

segment.source: Configure the necessary Active Directory groups and accounts.
segment.target: Configure the necessary Active Directory groups and accounts.

segment.source: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V
segment.target: Configuring Prerequisite Groups in Active Directory for App-V

segment.source: Configure the Internet Information Services (IIS) settings on the server that is running IIS.
segment.target: Configure the Internet Information Services (IIS) settings on the server that is running IIS.

segment.source: How to Configure Windows Server 2008 for App-V Management Servers
segment.target: How to Configure Windows Server 2008 for App-V Management Servers

segment.source: Configure the server that is running IIS to be trusted for delegation.
segment.target: Configure the server that is running IIS to be trusted for delegation.

segment.source: This is required only if you are installing the App-V Management Server by using a distributed system architecture, that is, if you install the App-V Management Console, the Management Web Service, and the database on different computers.
segment.target: This is required only if you are installing the App-V Management Server by using a distributed system architecture, that is, if you install the App-V Management Console, the Management Web Service, and the database on different computers.

segment.source: How to Configure the Server to be Trusted for Delegation
segment.target: How to Configure the Server to be Trusted for Delegation

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Checklists
